name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud-Native Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Cloud-Native** development and **Distributed Systems**. Proficient in **Microservices** architecture and **Containers** orchestration, with hands-on expertise in **Kubernetes**. Strong programming skills in **Golang**, along with extensive experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for both frontend and backend solutions. 
Demonstrated ability in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging **AI/ML** technologies for predictive analytics and automation. Adept at deploying cloud solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and employing **Open Source** developer tools to enhance operational efficiency. 
Experienced in compliance-driven development with a solid understanding of HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, complemented by a robust background in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
